text: TIME, OF COURSE, DO NOT HAVE ANY EMOTIONS, said Death, but he could not resist five armed men, and was forced to yield to the caprices of an old man, bowed, spectacled, aproned.

passages.fragment: TIME , OF COURSE , DO NOT HAVE ANY EMOTIONS , said Death ,
passages.full_quote: <used>TIME, OF COURSE, DO NOT HAVE ANY EMOTIONS, said Death, i</used>gnoring the interruption, BUT YOU ARE NOT OFFICIAL
I DON'T KNOW HOW TO TELL YOU THIS, <used>said Death, but he could</used>n't recall ever working for a completely sane person

An hour had passed since the sun had set, when Franz fancied he saw, at a quarter of a mile to the left, a dark mass<used>, but he could not</used> precisely make out what it was, and fearing to excite the mirth of the sailors by mistaking a floating cloud for land, he remained silent; suddenly a great light appeared on the strand; land might resemble a cloud, but the fire was not a meteor

passages.fragment: but he could not resist five armed men , and was forced to yield
passages.full_quote: The Frenchman made some resistance, and nearly strangled Beppo; <used>but he could not resist five armed men, and was forced to yield</used>

passages.fragment: was forced to yield to the
passages.full_quote: Ten minutes had elapsed since the nurse had left; Valentine, who for the last hour had been suffering from the fever which returned nightly, incapable of controlling her ideas, <used>was forced to yield to the</used> excitement which exhausted itself in producing and reproducing a succession and recurrence of the same fancies and images

passages.fragment: to yield to the caprices of an old man ,
passages.full_quote: These 900,000 francs will go out of the family in order to enrich some hospital; but it is ridiculous thus <used>to yield to the caprices of an old man, a</used>nd I shall, therefore, act according to my conscience.

passages.fragment: an old man , bowed , spectacled , aproned
passages.full_quote: A DAYFATHER He walked on through the caseroom passing <used>an old man, bowed, spectacled, aproned</used>
